hero_title: The greatest gift to those who are gone is remembrance.
hero_subtitle:
From the very beginning, we carved the names of our loved ones in

 stone, hoping they’d be remembered by those to come. But the

 memories behind, they faded with time...
legacy_title: The stone stood quiet, the legacy  was lost, their story was forgotten. Until today.
legacy_subtitle: In our digital haven you can cherish, share, and exchange memories of your departed loved ones in just a few clicks, while modern technology enables their story to be preserved, forever.
feature_1_title: Spiritus, a place where every life story finds its forever after.
feature_1_subtitle_1: Spiritus uses the newest data-storing technology to create a magnificent social impact. Only through Spiritus, monuments of loved one's lives become complete.
feature_1_subtitle_2: Spiritus gives you the opportunity to:
feature_1_list_1: Create a beautiful digital memorial of your loved ones.
feature_1_list_2: Exchange memories with family and friends.
feature_1_list_3: Store your loved one’s memories through blockchain, with 24/7 user support available to you.
feature_2_title: Our loved ones live through stories we tell of them.
feature_2_list_1: Save and forever preserve a digital memorial of your loved ones.
feature_2_list_2: Remember and commemorate their lives through stories and pictures.
feature_2_list_3: Share and exchange memories with family and friends.
feature_3_title: Transform city cemeteries into digital museums of life stories.
feature_3_subtitle_1: Through our newest feature "Memory Walk" you can:
feature_3_list_1: Read and cherish life stories of your fellow locals.
feature_3_list_2: Geolocate your loved one's burial place and make it visible for everyone who wishes to commemorate.
feature_3_list_3: Search and explore memorials all over the world.
feature_3_list_4: Ensure your loved one's story is remembered, forever.
join_community_title: Join the Spiritus community in our journey of remembrance.
join_community_subtitle: Let the stories of your loved ones live on. Save them within the world's first Museum of Life Stories.
